description: Découvrez les meilleurs hôtels à Kangaroo Island, Australia. Trouvez des offres exclusives et des hébergements de luxe.

hotels.title: Kangaroo Island Off-Grid Cabin with Ocean Views & Private Sauna
hotels.description: Surround yourself with nature and disconnect in ultimate luxury with a stay at CABN X Kangaroo Island. Light-filled, romantic and meticulously curated, each CABN X is carefully positioned with privacy in mind, offering captivating views over the rambling wilderness, access to a private beach and the waters of Antechamber Bay. Spend your days exploring the island’s treasures before returning to moments of repose by the fireplace and drinks on the deck.

hotels.title: Tranquil Kangaroo Island Escape Overlooking Pink Bay w. Secluded Beach
hotels.description: A serene stay awaits at Sea Dragon Kangaroo Island, a stunning retreat overlooking Pink Bay. Kangaroo Island is home to an abundance of native Australian wildlife, and many species can be glimpsed from this peaceful property. Set on 250 acres of coastal real estate, part of which is under heritage protection for its flora and fauna, this tranquil hideaway includes access to a secluded beach, where guests can safely swim, snorkel or enjoy a picnic or sun-downer.

hotels.title: Tranquil Kangaroo Island Escape Overlooking American River Bay with Onsite Restaurant & Bar
hotels.description: Experience Australia’s version of the Galapagos at this waterfront resort in Kangaroo Island, nestled between American River’s tranquil coves and native bushland. Enjoy well-appointed accommodations with stunning views, an onsite restaurant showcasing local produce, and easy access to nature trails. Spend days relaxing by the fireplace with a glass of local red wine, swim in the outdoor saltwater pool and explore island highlights like Stokes Bay and Admiral Arch.

hotels.title: All-Inclusive Kangaroo Island Luxury Lodge with Gourmet Dining & Island-Inspired Spa
hotels.description: Frequently heralded as one of the world's top luxury lodges, Kangaroo Island's Southern Ocean Lodge has reopened with elevated luxuries, redefining the gold standard for experiential travel. Situated amidst vast geo- and biodiversity, the lodge's architectural design seamlessly melds with the natural landscape, providing breathtaking views of the rugged Southern Ocean from its exclusive cliffside perch. Whether you choose to admire the rolling Australian bushlands during a spa treatment, simply recline on the beach or venture into the wonders of Kangaroo Island and spot native wildlife on a Signature Experience, the refreshing sea spray is your companion. With coastal serenity and local bounty at your fingertips, wining and dining is a gourmet affair featuring artisan pastries in the morning and regional degustation in the evening, paired with famous South Australian varietals. This is access to the wild beauty of 'Australia's Galapagos' at its most immersive.
